The killing has increased the tension between Kenneth Kaunda's supporters and the Government of President Frederick Chiluba. In 1991, Chiluba ousted Kaunda, who had ruled Zambia since independence in 1964. Kaunda and another opposition leader, Rodger Chongwe, claimed they were shot and wounded by police at a rally of Kaunda's United National Independence Party (Unip) in August 1997. … [Read more...] about Kaunda death: Yard called in
